title: AI Strategist & App Developer
bio: Mark Warrick is an AI strategist and app developer who helps translate domain expertise into practical, AI-powered applications. His work focuses on using AI to turn intent, decision-making, and real-world knowledge into usable software without requiring traditional development skills. Alongside his technical background, Mark brings deep domain experience in weather, outdoor photography, and mountain biking, shaped by years spent guiding and shooting in mountainous terrain. This combination allows him to bridge human expertise and AI in a grounded, practical way.
